title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, June 6, 2020
description: It was on this day in 1933 that the first drive-in movie theater opened, in Camden, New Jersey, bringing a little fun to the tough daily life of the Depression era.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1933 that the first drive-in movie theater opened, in Camden, New Jersey, bringing a little fun to the tough daily life of the Depression era.
